banner.comeWithFamily: Come with family & feel the joy of mouthwatering food

SaigonStarter.title: Saigon Starter
SaigonStarter.description: For all adventurous gourmets, here are the most popular appetizers on a platter

DuckCurry.title: DUCK'N CURRY
DuckCurry.description: Crispy baked duck in a red coconut curry sauce, with fresh vegetables, basil, and jasmine-scented rice

BeefRicenoodles.title: BEEF’N RICENOODLE
BeefRicenoodles.description: Rice noodles, tender beef, garlic, with a lime-ginger dressing

SpringrollsRicenoodle.title: SPRINGROLLS'N RICENOODLE
SpringrollsRicenoodle.description: Rice noodles, homemade spring rolls, garlic, onions, refined with Vietnamese herbs, seasoned with a lime-ginger dressing

TomaticSalmon.title: TOMATIC SALMON
TomaticSalmon.description: Freshly grilled salmon fillet on a bed of wok-tossed vegetables with tomatoes, green onions, refined with Vietnamese herbs

CalamariOnTamarind.title: CALAMARI ON TAMARIND
CalamariOnTamarind.description: Crispy squid rings in a sweet-sour tamarind sauce, served with fresh salad and jasmine-scented rice

SGLaLotRicenoodle.title: SAIGON LA LOT RICE NOODLE
SGLaLotRicenoodle.description: Rice noodles, juicy beef wrapped in an aromatic betel leaf and grilled, garlic, onions, refined with Vietnamese herbs, seasoned with a lime-ginger dressing

GarlicPrawn.title: GARLIC PRAWNS
GarlicPrawn.description: XXL prawns with fresh vegetables in a hearty garlic sauce, stir-fried in a wok, with a brown soy reduction.

PrawnCurry.title: PRAWNS’N CURRY
PrawnCurry.description: XXL prawns in a red coconut curry sauce, served with fresh vegetables, basil, and jasmine-scented rice.

ChickenCurry.title: CHICKEN’N CURRY
ChickenCurry.description: Crisp-fried chicken breast strips in a red coconut curry sauce, served with fresh vegetables, basil, and jasmine-scented rice.

FriedRicenoodleClassic.title: FRIED RICE NOODLE CLASSIC
FriedRicenoodleClassic.description: Rice ribbon noodles stir-fried in a wok with seasonal vegetables.

StirFriedNoodle.title: STIR-FRIED UDON
StirFriedNoodle.description: Spicy noodles from the wok with fresh seasonal vegetables.

offer.title: We offer the best Vietnamese taste
offer.subtitle: Origin Vietnamese Flavors
offer.description: Discover the rich and vibrant tastes of Vietnam with our curated dishes. From the fresh herbs and spices in our Saigon Starter to the warm, comforting bowl of Pho, each dish is crafted to bring the true essence of Vietnamese cuisine to your table.
